title: A Day in the Life of a Farmer
text: Sustainable livestock strategy. I work on Green Valley Farm, and every day is busy. In the morning, I wake up early and walk to the fields. The tractor starts slowly; I drive carefully on the farm road. I clean the barn after milking and store the tools. We use gloves and masks when handling chemicals. I feed the cows and make sure they have clean water. Sprayer calibration prevents over application. We assess soil nutrients to optimize fertilization plans. I talk to the team and assign tasks for the afternoon. Telemetry from precision agriculture guides irrigation decisions.
